title: Strategic Advantage in Bank Treasury and Risk White Paper
content:
REPORT

						

					
							
					Financial Services				
						
					
							
					Treasury				
						
						
			As Bank Treasuries face unprecedented challenges, how can treasury teams turn regulatory complexity, fragmented data, and shifting rates into operational advantage?
In this white paper, prepared in collaboration between Bloomberg and The Certificate of Bank Treasury Risk Management (BTRM), we consider the current opportunities and challenges that Bank Treasury teams face, given increasing volatility in global financial markets, and point to those areas of focus that they should consider to address to add value to their banks’ strategic advantage.
			

						
			Learn how to:
			

						
			
Strengthen regulatory readiness amid shifting Basel 3.1 expectations
Improve interest rate and liquidity risk insight with unified analytics
Elevate ALCO decision making through faster, more accurate balance sheet reporting

			

			
    
                
        
            
			
			Key themes covered:
			

						Regulatory complexity 

						Addressing risk 

						Liquidity and volatility 

						Data integration 

						Strategic value

						
			Get the report today to understand how treasury and risk leaders can turn regulatory pressure and market volatility into an opportunity to build a more resilient, insight- driven balance sheet and evolve into a strategic partner.
Whether you’re evaluating your capital structure, modernizing your execution tools or building a long-term tech roadmap, this report provides the clarity and foresight you need to act with confidence.
